subject: Marketing
title: Call-to-Action Science
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Call-to-Action Science.

hook.text: Changing 'Submit' to 'Get My Free Guide' increased conversions by 38% on one landing page.

buildup.text: The call to action is the moment where interest converts to behavior. Wording matters enormously.

discovery.text: Effective CTAs use first person, imply value received, and reduce perceived effort.

twist.text: 'Start my free trial' outperforms 'Start your free trial'â€”ownership language converts better.

climax.text: A CTA isn't a button label. It's the final argument that tips the decision.

punchline.text: Tell them what they'll get, not what they must do.

quiz.question: Why does 'Start my free trial' outperform 'Start your free trial'?
options: First-person ownership language increases conversion rates
Free trial offers always perform the same
